document.full_text: the u.s. midwest will be cool and wet for at least the next 10 days, preventing farmers from planting corn through most of april, a forecaster said on tuesday.
document.title: cool, wet weather halts midwest corn planting
lines_and_colors: the u.s. midwest will be cool and wet for at least the next 10 days, preventing farmers from planting corn through most of april, a forecaster said on tuesday.
